short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and fast way of updating the bookmarks bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An easy way to update bookmarks in the bookmarks bar to the currently viewed webpage. Simply, click on the extensions' icon and click on the desired bookmark to update it.

This extension was inspired by the process of having to delete and update bookmarks, specifically when taking online courses.
